alert.note: Alert for Central Arctic Plains; Central Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 20 at 11:45PM AKST until January 21 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. Winds are expected to decrease on Sunday, which will allow improvements in conditions. * WHERE...Central Arctic Plains and Central Brooks Range. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: A Wind Chill Advisory means that cold air and sustained wind speeds of 15 mph or more will create low wind chills. Frost bite and hypothermia can occur if precautions are not taken.

area.areaDesc: Central Arctic Plains; Central Brooks Range
